item.description:
Hi Everyone,

I have a friend that will be singing this Friday at Cafe Belo in Somerville. She is amazing and the guy that plays the guitar with her is really good too and it will be great to catch him before he goes on tour in Europe.

Let me know who is interested and I can give you more information. They will be there from 6-9 pm.

Um abraco para todos,

Carolina

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Music in Somerville
